Added Markdown version of README

title: Updated version: code=5, name=1.2.2
message: Updated version: code=5, name=1.2.2

title: Bool default settings values, instead of strings
message:
Bool default settings values, instead of strings

- Three default settings values (notification light, sound and
  vibration) are now defined as boolean items instead of strings.
- Added a new overloaded getBoolean method to PreferencesHelper to
  obtain a boolean preference given its key and the key of its default
  value.

title: Converted constant strings into items
message:
Converted constant strings into items

- Converted constant string elements (<string>) to item elements
  (<item>) of type "string".

title: Mark onCreate with @TargetApi(11), for ActionBar
message:
Mark onCreate with @TargetApi(11), for ActionBar

- SettingsActivity.onCreate() uses ActionBar (only if API level >= 11).
  Adding @TargetApi(11) prevents Lint from flagging this as an error.

title: Added up navigation support in SettingsActivity
message:
Added up navigation support in SettingsActivity

- On Android SDK >= 11, enable the home button of the SettingsActivity
  action bar (the logo) as the up button. Navigate back to
  CherryBerryActivity.

title: Set proper title in SettingsActivity
message: Set proper title in SettingsActivity

title: Moved settings keys from strings.xml to keys.xml
message:
Moved settings keys from strings.xml to keys.xml

- Added new res/values/keys.xml file for storing string keys, such as
  settings keys, which should not change between locales.
- Moved settings_key_x from strings.xml to the new file.

title: Added Spanish string translations
message: Added Spanish string translations

title: Strings naming convention: settings_title_x
message: Strings naming convention: settings_title_x

title: Reorganized strings.xml line order
message:
Reorganized strings.xml line order

- Moved related strings (e.g. settings_key_x, notification_x) together.

title: Clarified string naming conventions
message:
Clarified string naming conventions

- Dialogs: dialog_{title|message}_x
- Notifications: notification_{title|text}_x
- Buttons: button_x
- Menus: menu_item_x
- settings_summary_duration, settings_message_in_minutes

title: Version code = 4, version name = 1.2.1
message: Version code = 4, version name = 1.2.1

title: Use constant TAG in CherryBerryActivity for logs
message: Use constant TAG in CherryBerryActivity for logs

title: When returning from settings, update timer view
message:
When returning from settings, update timer view

- Start SettingsActivity using startActivityForResult.
- On returning, update the timerTextView to the new pomodoro duration
  preference, if currently idle.

title: Show pomodoro duration preference by default
message:
Show pomodoro duration preference by default

- When creating CherryBerryActivity, load and set the timer text to the
  current pomodoro duration preference value.

title: Added timerTextView field, initialized only once
message:
Added timerTextView field, initialized only once

- Added a new timerTextView field to CherryBerryActivity, initialized in
  the onCreate method.

title: statusTextView now a field initialized only once
message:
statusTextView now a field initialized only once

- Instead of having multiple findViewById(R.id.statusTextView), added a
  field to CherryBerryActivity and initialize it to this view in the
  onCreate method.

title: Catch errors when parsing string pref into int
message:
Catch errors when parsing string pref into int

- Catch NumberFormatException in PreferencesHelper.getIntFromString,
  returning the default value in case of error.
- This should not happen naturally anymore as SettingsActivity makes a
  check before setting an invalid number, but just in case.

title: Use XML-defined constants in PreferencesHelper
message:
Use XML-defined constants in PreferencesHelper

- Remove hard-coded default values for settings in PreferencesHelpers.
- Use constants from constants.xml, parsing strings for boolean
  preferences.

title: Check valid numbers in pomodoro settings
message:
Check valid numbers in pomodoro settings

- Added SettingsActivity.CheckNumberOnPreferenceChangeListener, which
  checks that the new preference value is a valid number and returns
  false otherwise.
- Set this listener for the two pomodoro number settings.

title: Load default values when creating main activity
message: Load default values when creating main activity

title: Set default values for notification settings
message:
Set default values for notification settings

- Added three string constants for the default values of notification
  settings.
- Uses these constants to set the default values in settings.xml.

title: Use default values from constants in settings.xml
message:
Use default values from constants in settings.xml

- Added new constants.xml resource file, with default values for
  pomodoro and break duration.
- Set the default value of these settings in settings.xml using these
  constants.

title: Removed duplicate background, moved to mdpi
message:
Removed duplicate background, moved to mdpi

- Removed duplicate file background.png.
- Moved the only copy to drawable-mdpi, as recommended by lint.

title: Set custom notification LED color and timing
message:
Set custom notification LED color and timing

- Change the notification LED light color to red, and the timing to
  300ms on, 3000ms off.

title: Updated version code to 3, version name to 1.2
message: Updated version code to 3, version name to 1.2

title: Notification icon now resembles app icon
message:
Notification icon now resembles app icon

- The style of the notification icon is now similar to the one of the
  application.
- Follow ICS icon guidelines.
- Added icon sizes of HDPI, MDPI and LDPI.

title: Renamed cancel to stop, added cancelTimer method
message:
Renamed cancel to stop, added cancelTimer method

- Added cancelTimer private method to PomodoroTimerService, which just cancels tthe current countdown timer, if any.
- Renamed cancel to stop. stop calls cancelTimer and the setIdle.

title: Extracted checkPomodoroTimerServiceStatus method
message: Extracted checkPomodoroTimerServiceStatus method

title: Extracted bindPomodoroTimerService method
message:
Extracted bindPomodoroTimerService method

- This method only issues a bind if the PomodoroTimerSercive is not bound yet.

title: Skip break when selecting option on dialog
message:
Skip break when selecting option on dialog

- Added public skip method to PomodoroTimerService, currently an alias to cancel. In the future these will be different, i.e. regarding pomodoro counting.
- Selecting the skip option on the pomodoro finished dialog calls this method.

title: Cancel pomodoro if option selected on dialog
message:
Cancel pomodoro if option selected on dialog

- Added setIdle private method to PomodoroTimerService, which sets status to idle, resets variables and saves state.
- Call this method from cancel.
- Cancel option on pomodoro finshed dialog call PomodoroTimerService#cancel.

title: Start break if selected option on dialog

message: Fixed some wrong string resources

title: Update status on restore if finished offline
message:
Update status on restore if finished offline

- PomodoroTimerService#onRestore can detect if a pomodoro or break was running, but they have already finished while the service was not running.
- In this case, update the status to reflect that the pomodoro or break has already finished.

title: Show a dialog when pomodoro finishes
message:
Show a dialog when pomodoro finishes

- Show a three-option dialog when a pomodoro finishes while CherryBerryActivity is running.

title: Timer listener separates pomodoro/break finish
message:
Timer listener separates pomodoro/break finish

- Separated onFinish into onPomodoroFinish and onBreakFinish in PomodoroTimerListener.

title: Don't start timer, save state unless duration > 0
message: Don't start timer, save state unless duration > 0

message: Set the listener if the timer is already running

title: Save/restore timer state to shared prefs
message:
Save/restore timer state to shared prefs

- Addded saveState, restoreState methods to PomodoroTimerService, which save sattus, startTimer, endTimer to shared preferences.
- Call restore state from onCreate.
- Call saveState from startPomodoroTimer and starBreakTimer.

message: Removed old save/restore instance state methods

title: Show a status bar notification on pomodoro finish
message:
Show a status bar notification on pomodoro finish

- NotificationService shows a status bar notification when a pomodoro finishes, instead of a toast.
- Removed private notification id constant from PomodoroTimerService, moved as a public constant to NotificationService. Every notification should use the same id.

title: Persistent notifications on PomodoroTimerService
message:
Persistent notifications on PomodoroTimerService

- Removed class PersistentNotificationService.
- Persistent notification handling (very limited for now) moved to PomodoroTimerService.

title: Added methods to continue a pomodoro or break
message:
Added methods to continue a pomodoro or break

- Added continuePomodoro, continueBreak methods to start the timer to continue a still running pomodoro or break.
- Extracted more private methods to remove duplication.

title: Timer methods don't require an Activity parameter
message:
Timer methods don't require an Activity parameter

- Public methods of PomodoroTimerActivityService no longer have an Activity parameters. As a service, it is able to launch intents and set alarms.

title: PomodoroTimerService keeps start/end time of timer
message: PomodoroTimerService keeps start/end time of timer

title: onStop cancel timer and unbind; onRestart bind
message:
onStop cancel timer and unbind; onRestart bind

- CherryBerryActivity#onStop() cancels the timer and unbinds from the service.
- #onRestart() binds agains with the service. No state is restores in any case yet.

title: Activity binds to and uses PomodoroTimerService
message:
Activity binds to and uses PomodoroTimerService

- CherryBerryActivity binds to PomodoroTimerService on the onStart method.
- When bound, default timer parameters are set.
- After binding, timer service is used on buttons.

title: Renamed timer field; added timerServiceBound field
message: Renamed timer field; added timerServiceBound field

title: PomodoroTimerService returns a binder
message:
PomodoroTimerService returns a binder

- PomodoroTimerService#onBind() returns a LocalBinder instance.
- This inner class's getService method returns the instance of this service.

title: Intent actions static fields now final; comments
message: Intent actions static fields now final; comments

title: Renamed PomodoroTimer, extends Service
message:
Renamed PomodoroTimer, extends Service

- PomodoroTimer has been renamed to PomodoroTimerService.
- This class now extends Service, with an empty implementation of onBind.
- Added PomodoroTimerService to manifest

title: Added support for PomodoroTimer notifications
message:
Added support for PomodoroTimer notifications

- Added PomodoroTimerListener, with onFinished and onTick methods.
- InternalTimer takes a listener to be notified on timer events.
- PomodoroTimer keeps a listener that will be used for all new timers.

title: Added a CountDownTimer to PomodoroTimer
message:
Added a CountDownTimer to PomodoroTimer

- Added InternalTimer, a subclass of CountDownTimer, to PomodoroTimer.
- Implemented startPomodoro(long), startBreak(long), cancel().
- Added default pomodoro and break duration fields and accessor methods.
- Added startPomodoro(), startBreak() which take the default durations.

title: Added PomodoroTimer class for timer functionality
message:
Added PomodoroTimer class for timer functionality

- Added a new PomodoroTimer class for controlling timer-related functionality.
- PomodoroTimer mantains the status of the current pomodoro.
